title: Hello there! I'm a passionate developer

description.primary: Currently working as a SDE Intern at RingCentral India. I specialize in building high-quality software solutions and applications using modern technologies like Langchain, Streamlit, and Next.js. I have obtained Gold+Elite Certification in Soft Computing and Data Science, offered by NPTEL.
description.secondary: My focus is on creating efficient, scalable solutions to complex problems through innovative approaches and clean code.
